title: bhakthi koladhi vAdhe
sahitya:
bhakti koladi vAde paramAthmudu
bhukti mukti thane ichchu bhuvi paramAthmudu




caraNam 1



patina vAriche bidda paramAthmudu
patta payaki danamu paramAthmudu
patta pagadi velagu paramAthmudu
etta neduda nEnnunna nida paramAthmudu





caraNam 2


pachi pAla lOni veNNa paramAthmudu
pachina vAsina nUvu paramAthmudu
pachchi sEdi oragallu paramAthmudu
ichcha koladivAdu vO yI paramAthmudu



caraNam 3



palu kula lOni tEda paramAthmudu
paliyindu indariki paramAthmudu
palimi shrI vEnkatAdri paramAthmudu
elami jIvula prAna mI paramAthmudu
